name: Klipper Filament Dryer
description: Klipper add-on to automatically turn on a filament dryer heater based on the humidity level or manually for a specified amount of time. An optional can also be opened/closed on an interval.

name: Auto Bed Leveler
description: Automates bed leveling for precise prints.

name: Speed Booster
description: Increases print speed without quality loss.
